comment: по клику на какой-нибудь небольшой ящик или шкатулку

languages.text: Ящик доверху забит литыми эмблемами, какие носили телохранители Теодоры. На некоторых из них видны брызги засохшей крови.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Следы пребывания Теодоры в заброшенном лагере

languages.text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
languages.original_text: Ящик доверху забит литыми эмблемами, какие носили телохранители Теодоры. На некоторых из них видны брызги засохшей крови.

traits.locale_text: The box is filled up with the cast emblems that Theodora's bodyguards used to wear. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
The box is filled up with the cast emblems that Theodora's bodyguards used to wear. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
The box is filled up with the cast emblems that Theodora's bodyguards used to wear. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
The box is filled up with the cast emblems that Theodora's bodyguards used to wear. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

languages.text: La boîte est remplie d'insignes en métal forgé que portaient les gardes du corps de Théodora Certains sont couverts de taches de sang séché.
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

traits.locale_text: La boîte est remplie d'emblèmes que portaient les gardes du corps de Théodora. Certains sont couverts de taches de sang séché.

languages.text: La caja está llena de emblemas metálicos como los que llevaban los guardaespaldas de Theodora. Algunos incluso tienen manchas de sangre.
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

traits.locale_text: La caja está llena de los emblemas que llevaban los guardaespaldas de Theodora. Algunos incluso tienen manchas de sangre.

languages.text: 盒子里装满了金属徽章，看起来很像是西奥多拉的护卫曾佩戴过的那种，一部分徽章溅上了干涸的血迹。
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

traits.locale_text: 盒子里装满了西奥多拉的随行人员曾佩戴过的徽章，一部分徽章溅上了干涸的血迹。

languages.text: 箱の中は、シオドーラの護衛たちが身に着けていた鋳造金属の記章でいっぱいだ。乾燥した血痕が付着しているものもある。
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

traits.locale_text: 箱の中は、シオドーラの護衛たちが身に着けていた鋳造金属の記章でいっぱいだ。乾燥した血痕が付着しているものもある。

languages.text: Die Schatulle ist gefüllt mit gusseisernen Insignien wie Theodoras Leibwache sie trägt. Auf einigen von ihnen ist getrocknetes Blut zu sehen.
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.

traits.locale_text: Die Box ist gefüllt mit den gusseisernen Emblemen, die Theodoras Leibwache früher getragen hat. Auf einigen von ihnen ist getrocknetes Blut zu sehen.

languages.text: Kutunun içi, Theodora'nın korumalarının giydiklerine benzeyen dökme metal nişanlarla dolu. Bazılarının üzerinde kurumuş kan damlaları var.
languages.original_text: The box is filled up with cast metal insignia like the ones worn by Theodora's bodyguards. Some of them have splatters of dried blood on them.
